name: ItemService
description: Lambda for the NYPL Item Service

scripts.deploy-dev: node-lambda deploy -n itemService -e qa -f config/var_qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json -o arn:aws:iam::224280085904:role/lambda_basic_execution -b subnet-f4fe56af -g sg-1d544067 -P nypl-sandbox
scripts.deploy-production: node-lambda deploy -e production -f config/var_production.env -S config/event_sources_production.json -o 'arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access' -b subnet-5deecd15,subnet-59bcdd03 -g sg-116eeb60 -P nypl-digital-dev
